# fmc_host_objects (Resource)

Resource for Host Objects in FMC

## Example
An example is shown below: 
```hcl
resource "fmc_host_objects" "host" {
    name        = "Web Server"
    value       = "10.10.10.10"
    description = "K8s primary"
}
```
